text.textblock: 2. The tables published under the authority of §67.4 are proposed to be amended as follows:

table.textblock: Depth in feet above ground. *Elevation in feet (NGVD).
at the Calais City Hall, Community Development Office, Church Street, Calais, Maine.
Send comments to The Honorable Harold Clark, Mayor of the City of Calais, Washington County, Calais City Hall, Church Street, Calais, Maine 04619.
